Method Detail

pack

public static void pack(java.io.File sourceFolder,
                        java.io.File saveToFile,
                        AESKey aesKey,
                        java.io.File tempFileForEncryption)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        InvalidFormatException
Pack the patch from the folder.

Parameters:
sourceFolder - the folder that store the patch data to be pack
saveToFile - the place to store the packed patch
aesKey - the cipher key, null means don't use encryption
tempFileForEncryption - if aesKey is specified, this should be provided to store the temporary encrypted file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when packing
InvalidFormatException - the format of the patch XML in the patch is invalid
